sentences: Minami Momochi (Japanese: 桃知みなみ, Hepburn: Momochi Minami) is a Japanese DJ, idol and presenter, specialising in music from anime.
Her other roles include acting as a guide to Asagaya's Anime Street, working as an ambassador for Akihabara, hosting NicoNico Douga live broadcasts, and presenting professional wrestling matches.
In 2014, Momochi successfully crowdfunded a campaign to become the star in a series of sci-fi ninja light novels, raising ¥1,852,300 ($17,000) on the website Green Funding.
